body:
Here is a second attempt at checking the storage durability. Let me know if this looks more appropriate.

I'm still running into a problem with this [test](https://github.com/brittanystoroz/normandy/blob/82266f2030c81ce6cb804a638f516d60a3aa08bd/client/actions/tests/test_shield-study.js#L27-L34) erring out before confirming the assertion that it threw an error.
